monk.name: Monk
monk.hit points:
First Level: 8 + Constitution Modifier
After First: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per Monk level
monk.tool proficiencies: Choose one type of artisan's tools or one musical instrument
monk.skill proficiencies:
Choose two from:
Acrobatics
Athletics
History
Insight
Religion
Stealth

(a) a shortsword or (b) any simple weapon
(a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack
10 darts
